LanguageData.RotR_AISR2GNew.label: AISR2G
LanguageData.RotR_AISR2GNew.description: Advanced In Situ Road Resources Gatherer. Uses local resources when building roads, completely eliminating the need to bring wood, stone , steel, Chemfuel , Plasteel and Uranium at the cost of twice the work.
LanguageData.RotR_ISR2GNew.label: ISR2G
LanguageData.RotR_ISR2GNew.description: In Situ Road Resource Gatherer. Uses local resources when building roads, completely eliminating the need to bring wood and stone at the cost of 4 times the work.
